translations: n.叙述，故事；叙述的手法（narrative 复数）

sentences.sentence: Three major narratives intertwine within Foucault's text, "Madness and Civilization."
sentences.translation: 福考特的文章《疯狂与文明》中交织着三种主要的叙述。

sentences.sentence: Contemporary research on love stories has elaborated on how these narratives determine the shape of our relationships and our lives.
sentences.translation: 当代对爱情故事的研究已经详细阐述了这些故事是如何决定我们的关系和生活的。

sentences.sentence: Sternberg contemporary research on love stories has elaborated on how these narratives determine the shape of our relationships and our lives.
sentences.translation: 斯特恩伯格对爱情故事的当代研究详细阐述了这些故事是如何决定我们的关系和生活的。
